00022   size_t nodeSize ;
00023   size_t numNodes ;

00062 void *
00063 vl_heap_get_node_with_index (VlHeap * self, int unsigned nodeIndex)
00064 {
00065   char * rawData = self->nodes ;
00066   return rawData + self->nodeSize * nodeIndex ;
00067 }
00068 
00075 int unsigned
00076 vl_heap_get_node_num (VlHeap * self)
00077 {
00078   return self->numNodes ;
00079 }
00080 
00086 void
00087 vl_heap_clear (VlHeap * self)
00088 {
00089   self->numNodes = 0 ;
00090 }
00091 
00101 VL_INLINE int unsigned
00102 vl_heap_parent (int unsigned nodeIndex)
00103 {
00104   if (nodeIndex == 0) return 0 ;
00105   return (nodeIndex - 1) / 2 ;
00106 }
00107 
00114 VL_INLINE int unsigned
00115 vl_heap_left_child (int unsigned nodeIndex)
00116 {
00117   return 2 * nodeIndex + 1 ;
00118 }
00119 
00126 VL_INLINE int unsigned
00127 vl_heap_right_child (int unsigned nodeIndex)
00128 {
00129   return vl_heap_left_child (nodeIndex) + 1 ;
00130 }
